hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the real Phantom Ganon is bright and loud.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: You've met with a terrible fate, haven't you?

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #the Iron Boots# and #a Purple Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #an Ice Trap#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #Arrows (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial Second Right Chest

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that ##the Lost Woods## has #2# major items.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that a hero ventures #beyond the wasteland# to learn #the Serenade of Water#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to #the Key#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Ice Cavern#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #a Zora Scale# can be found at #Zora's River#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Strength Upgrade# and #a Wallet#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the path to #the Tower#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##the Thieves' Hideout## has #0# major items.

LH (Lab).text: They say that plundering #the Water Temple# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Megaton Hammer# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #Nayru's Love# and #a Zora Tunic#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

SFM (Saria).text: Where did Anju meet her lover?^${12 39 C7}At a Kafei.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides #Damp√©'s Hut#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the #Mask of Truth# yields #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #a Red Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #the Boomerang# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.
